bundle.does.not.contain.min.constituents: Bundle does not contain the minimum number of required bundle constituents.

need.email: Customer email address must be specified.
field.invalid.size: '{field-name}' value must contain between 0 and 255 characters.

field.invalid.minimum.value-msg-2: Quantity field is missing or has invalid value.

item.missing.price: Item '{item-code}' does not have a price.
item.no.longer.available: Item '{item-code}' is no longer available for purchase.
